intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you want to achieve this year?
What do you do in the morning?
What do you want to learn?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. The waiter asks you.
You are in a clothing shop. A customer asks you.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to help a friend with something. ..
You are in a shop. Ask for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: I need help with my homework. Can you help me? I do not understand this part. It is very hard for me. Thank you for your help.

questions.question: What do I need help with?

monologue.topic: Talk about things you do with friends

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like to do with your friends?
Where do you go with your friends?
When do you meet your friends?
Why is it fun to be with friends?
